reviewText: While I understand the general setup of the Paley Center interviews, it would have been nice to have scenes added to the dvd. But it was great to see these wonderful actors together one last time.
I truly enjoyed this farewell to such a great soap. I truly miss As The World Turns. My DVD arrived in mint condition and I will truly treasure it for years to come.

I will admit mostly into ABC soaps...but through out the years of course I turned itno oakdale.  The story of Luke & Noah, and then Luke mourning the doctor,a nd Noah theere to pick up the pieces.  We cna keep the cast's tribute of a soap that lasted for quite a whiel........
had to send 1st disc back because it would not play in dvd player nor blu ray nor computer. received the 2nd a day or so later and viola enjoyed the presentation

I thoroughly enjoyed this dvd.  It was worth it for me seeing Kathryn Hays, Eileen Fulton and Don Hastings in this forum, it really made the dvd for me.  I only wish it included scenes from the past.  It would be great if episodes were released, even if it was only highlight episodes from stories over the years.
For fans only -- a shaky but informative taped interview for those who want to get a bit of insight from the cast and crew of ATWT, days before the show wrapped for good.
Sad to see this show go off the Air in September 21 2010 after being on air since 1956 watched this show since 1988 to when i was in Middle school
Been watching this program since I was in grade school.  Was sad to see it leave.
If you are an As the World Turns fan you will LOVE this!!
It would have been 5 stars if clips from past episodes were included.
Wish there were more of these.
I miss As the World Turns as a TV show...... This DVD is a great way to say farewell to this TV Show.....
One of the best DVD's for any true fan of this great soap opera
So nice to see them all together again.  I miss As The World Turns more than words can say.  This is such a nice treat.
I loved it.  I had watched As The World Turns regularly when I was a stay at home mom and loved it then.
A must have DVD for all who followed As the World Turns! It is great to see some of the cast again as they reflect on their roles and the show as it neared it's end.
